Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 26 for SLE 12 SP5)

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 26 for SLE 12 SP5)
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 4.12.14-122_103 fixes one issue.

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2021-0935: In ip6_xmit of ip6_output.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. (bsc#1192032)
Notes.Title: Details
